speech:
Some Mental health and Health Emergency numbers are :-                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           1. General Medical Emergency

    108: The national emergency number in India for medical, police, and fire emergencies.
    112: All-in-one emergency helpline for medical, police, and fire emergencies across India.

2. Mental Health and Suicide Prevention Helplines

    Kiran Mental Health Rehabilitation Helpline: 1800-599-0019
        A 24/7 mental health support line by the Government of India, providing assistance for mental health issues.
    Snehi Foundation: 91-22-2772 6771
        A helpline offering counseling services, especially for mental health crises.
    iCALL (Tata Institute of Social Sciences): 9152987821
        Available from 10 AM to 8 PM, Monday to Saturday. Provides free counseling and emotional support.
    AASRA: 91-22-2754 6669
        24/7 helpline providing suicide prevention counseling.
    Vandrevala Foundation: 1860-266-2345 or 022-662-62525
        A dedicated helpline for emotional and mental well-being support.
